abstract: David Brooks Op-Ed column underscores degree to which Pope Francis' visit to United States is spiritual and cultural event; suggests Francis is model for how to listen and learn and how to uphold moral standards; argues Francis makes case for intimate engagement with world that is unmarred by rigid adherence to the ideological.
lead_paragraph: On Francis’ visit, he will offer a model on listening and learning, and upholding moral standards while remaining loving and merciful.

headline.main: Pope Francis, the Prince of the Personal

snippet: On Francis’ visit, he will offer a model on listening and learning, and upholding moral standards while remaining loving and merciful.
